item.title: Test
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

title: “Markdown Syntax Guide” date: 2019-12-01T21:57:40+08:00 lastmod: 2020-01-01T16:45:40+08:00 draft: false author: “Hugo Authors” authorLink: “https://gohugo.io/" description: “Sample article showcasing basic Markdown syntax and formatting for HTML elements.” license: "”

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
